Title: Let us welcome the new century with wide-open arms - 1919-1999 - Commemorate the 80th anniversary of the May Fourth Movement - National Financial May Fourth Youth Medal
Designer: Chinese Communist Youth League Central Financial Work Committee (中国共产主义青年团中央金融工作委员会)
Publisher: Shanghai Coin Factory of the China Coin and Banknote Company (中国印钞造币总公司上海印钞厂)
